pages.text: A tart juice made from glowberries that maintains its glow inducing quality. It's anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant effects will make you feel a little healthier almost instantly!

pages.title: Goldenberry Juice
pages.text: $(br) Time: 30min $(br) 2-3 Servings $(br2)$(l) Ingredients - $()$(br)$(li) 1 cup Goldenberries$(li) 1/2 cups water$(li) 1 tbsp sugar or honey $(br2)

$(li)Wash or defrost berries. Place berries in saucepan with water. Bring to a low boil over medium-high heat; simmer until berries form a paste (about 30 minutes). $(li)Let the pulp cool down $(li)Remove saucepan from burner and place berries a little at a time in a cheese cloth-lined sieve or juice bag over a large, glass bowl and squeeze the juice out into the bowl. Discard the mash.
$(li) Sweeten to taste with sugar; return to saucepan and heat for 2-3 minutes until sugar is dissolved. Remove from burner, cool, and refrigerate.
